treatment.description: Leaf blades ovate or spatulate, margins sinuate. Flowers: petals sometimes aborted or reduced to bristles. Fruits 4-angled; terminal segment turbinate or 4-angled, 12–26 × 3–9 mm, apex usually acute or blunt, rarely retuse.

key_statement.statement: Fruits: terminal segment turbinate, 5–9 mm wide, apex relatively short
Fruits: terminal segment 4-angled, 3–5 mm wide, apex relatively long
